tweet: Here is a script and instructions for automatically provisioning a Chainlink node on Google cloud in under 3 minutes. This is not mainnet hardened nor supported by me. I'm just happy to demonstrate how the steps can be automated.  $LINK   https://t.co/ijh4uBizKk

#Chainlink is an open source, decentralized oracle which can be used to provide external data to Ethereum smart contracts. Connecting external data allows a contract to have knowledge of real-world external events, APIs, and other blockchains $Link   https://t.co/VhmtsHMG6u
